Text: Thanks for all the torrents!  They're excellent and much appreciated.  Do you also have any current Punisher or Conan comics?  Cheers
I'm uploading Punisher comics regularly as they are out,but have stopped reading Conan a while ago...
Any chance on some Green Lantern uploads? Otherwise, love what you do here.

TucsonRican:my computer got fried only a week ago,so I lost some major collections of comics.Since there are way too many green lantern titles out there you'll have to be more specific about what issues you would want me to upload,and I can't guarantee that I'll do your request anytime soon...sorry,but that's the way it is for now...
great stuff ..thanx fer all you do..i'm getting older and have read most but cant afford to re-buy all of them ..thanx fer helpin me relive the memories
